reason: Question asks '신청 자격이 있는 사람은 누구' (who qualifies to apply) but source defines school conditions (5학급 이하), not individual qualifications. Answer dumps legal text without addressing 'who'.
Duplicate answer of q_2_0048 - identical answer body with only intro line changed. Also '자격 요건' framing is misleading for content about school conditions.
Duplicate answer of q_2_0048/0049. Question about '제외되는 경우' (exclusion cases) is not specifically addressed - answer just dumps the same two legal clauses.
Bad/vague meta-question ('자주 묻는 질문이 있나요?') - not a valid content question. Duplicate answer of other 교감 미배치 entries.
Vague subjective question ('가장 중요한 점'). Source does not rank importance. Answer is raw dump of clauses (1)-(4) without identifying what is most important.
Duplicate answer of other 교감 미배치 entries (q_2_0048, 0049, 0053). Vague question ('핵심 내용') adds no differentiation.
Hallucinated question topic - '서류 제출 기한' (document submission deadline) has zero basis in source page 103. Source contains no information about deadlines. Answer does not address it either.
Vague subjective question ('가장 중요한 조건'). Source does not rank conditions by importance. Duplicate answer of other 교감 미배치 entries.
Bad question - '1번째 항목은 무엇인가요' is a structural/navigation query, not a meaningful content question about personnel regulations.
Vague subjective question ('관련 규정이 중요한 이유'). Source lists regulations but never explains why they are important. Answer is raw dump of most of page 103 content.
